title: Former Metropolitan Police chief issues 'road to Hell' warning as he calls for review of bail reforms
text:
An urgent shake-up of police bail is required, says a former Metropolitan Police Commissioner, who compared the new system to a “road to Hell paved with good intentions.”

Sir Ian Blair said changes in 2017 to restrict bail to 28 days had been designed to prevent “unacceptable” cases of suspects being left on bail for years.

It introduced the power for police to release suspects under investigation but, unlike bail, without any restrictions.
